price: តើរឿងរ៉ាវរបស់ភ្ញៀវអ៊ីព្រហ៊ីម(ម៉ាឡាអ៊ីកាត់)ដែលត្រូវ គេលើកតម្កើងបានមកដល់អ្នក(មូហាំម៉ាត់)ដែរឬទេ ?
arabic: هَلۡ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيۡفِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: hal atāka ḥadīthu ḍayfi ib'rāhīma al-muk'ramīna
